item.title: 谷歌起诉中国 "Darcula "组织，指控其实施网络钓鱼计划
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司对所谓的中国网络犯罪分子提起诉讼，指控该组织策划了一场大规模的网络钓鱼活动，旨在诱骗美国人交出他们的信用卡号码。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google filed a lawsuit against alleged Chinese cybercriminals, accusing the group of orchestrating a vast phishing campaign designed to dupe Americans into turning over their credit card numbers.】

item.title: 引发美国经济负担危机的另一项保险费用
item.description:
美国共和党领导的国会让《平价医疗法案》的补贴失效，引发了成本飙升。

但是，不断上涨的汽车保险费用也让美国人付出了代价。【原文：

The GOP-led Congress is letting Affordable Care Act subsidies lapse, triggering a cost spike. But rising auto insurance bills are taking a toll on Americans, too. 

】

item.title: 英伟达就工程师窃取数据的商业机密案达成和解
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）解决了一起涉及一名前工程师的诉讼，该工程师无意中泄露了他从前任雇主处窃取的自动驾驶商业机密。【原文：Nvidia Corp. settled a lawsuit involving a former engineer who had inadvertently revealed autonomous driving trade secrets that he stole from a previous employer.】

item.title: 马里兰州官员称可能为重要桥梁重建发行债券
item.description: 弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥于 2024 年坍塌，中断了一条重要的经济通道，马里兰州官员预计将发行债券，为重建这座大桥提供资金。【原文：Maryland officials anticipate issuing bonds to help finance the rebuilding of the Francis Scott Key Bridge, which collapsed in 2024 and disrupted a major economic gateway.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州 Brightline 公司计划举债 1 亿美元以增强流动性
item.description: 迈阿密和奥兰多之间的私营铁路公司 Brightline 表示，根据其最新的乘客量和收入报告，它正在考虑增发 1 亿美元的债务，用于运营和支付潜在的法律索赔。【原文：Brightline, the private rail line between Miami and Orlando, said it’s considering issuing $100 million in additional debt for operations and to pay potential legal claims, according to its latest ridership and revenue report.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-科恩考虑成立大宗商品部门，对冲基金纷纷下注
item.description: Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）正在考虑建立大宗商品业务，因为多地区对冲基金正跃跃欲试，希望通过大宗商品的波动来提高收益。【原文：Point72 Asset Management is considering building a commodities business as multistrategy hedge funds jump on the volatile play to drive returns.】

item.title: 边境巡逻队节前卷土重来困扰芝加哥经济
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的移民镇压行动又回到了芝加哥，美国边境巡逻队的突袭行动有可能在假期前扰乱商业活动。【原文：President Donald Trump’s immigration crackdown is returning to Chicago, with raids carried out by US Border Patrol threatening to disrupt businesses before the holidays.】

item.title: 亚马逊任命新任人工智能主管，与技术竞争对手一决高下
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在重组人工智能项目团队，让公司云计算部门的一位高层领导负责一个新部门。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is reorganizing teams working on artificial intelligence projects, putting a top leader from the company’s cloud division in charge of a new unit.】

item.title: 伦敦富人区在征收 "豪宅税 "的基础上面临大幅增税
item.description: 在工党政府取消了议会税收上限，以弥补其将资金转移到贫困社区的努力之后，伦敦及其周边的六个富裕地区在未来几年的年税收增幅将超过 5%。【原文：Six wealthy areas in and around London are set for annual tax hikes in excess of 5% in the coming years, after the Labour government lifted a cap on council levies to make up for its efforts to shift funds to poorer communities.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉通胀率飙升至 500% 以上，特朗普加大施压力度
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加紧在经济上孤立加拉加斯社会主义政权的行动，委内瑞拉的通货膨胀率急剧上升。【原文：Venezuelan inflation is skyrocketing as US President Donald Trump ratchets up his campaign to financially isolate the socialist regime in Caracas.】

item.title: 甲骨文与蓝猫头鹰在数据中心问题上的分歧引发市场对人工智能繁荣的担忧
item.description: 越来越清楚的是，哪怕是数据中心出现一丝一毫的问题，都足以吓倒那些寄希望于人工智能热潮在 2026 年推动股票市场和债务交易浪潮的投资者。【原文：It’s becoming clear that even the slightest hint of trouble around data centers is enough to spook investors who are banking on the artificial-intelligence boom to power equity markets and provide a wave of debt deals in 2026.】

item.title: 托姆将卸任蒙特利尔银行信贷交易主管一职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，史蒂夫-托姆（Steve Thom）将从蒙特利尔银行全球信贷交易主管的职位上退休。【原文：Steve Thom will retire as head of global credit trading at Bank of Montreal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊通过追踪按键数据抓获朝鲜 IT 员工
item.description: 安保人员跟踪承包商的连接。【原文：Security personnel tracked connections from a contractor.】

item.title: 安达信集团 1.76 亿美元美国首次公开募股后股价大涨 34
item.description: 安达信集团公司是一家专业服务公司在美国的分支机构，接替了已关闭的会计巨头安达信，其股票在首次交易中上涨了 34%。【原文：Shares of Andersen Group Inc., the US arm of the professional services firm that succeeded the shuttered accounting giant Arthur Andersen, rallied as much as 34% in its trading debut.】

item.title: 卢拉告诉欧盟南方共同市场贸易协定刻不容缓
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）敦促欧盟与南美国家敲定一项大规模贸易协定，并告诉仍在犹豫不决的各国领导人，如果现在不完成这项协定，在他的眼皮底下就不会达成。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva urged the European Union to finalize a massive trade agreement with South American nations, telling still-hesitant leaders that the deal won’t happen on his watch if it doesn’t get done now.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 任命前首席财务官为新总裁，以解决俄罗斯困境
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 将任命一位前财务总监担任下一任首席执行官，此前多年来，该公司一直试图出售其俄罗斯业务部门，但均未成功。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG will appoint a former finance chief as its next chief executive officer after years of unsuccessful attempts to sell its Russian unit.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命 Edward Byun 和 Tegh Kapur 领导技术 ECM
item.description: 摩根大通公司任命 Edward Byun 为技术股权资本市场全球主管，Tegh Kapur 为美洲技术 ECM 主管。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. named Edward Byun global head of technology equity capital markets and Tegh Kapur the head of technology ECM in the Americas.】

item.title: 法国经济摆脱预算危机实现持续增长
item.description: 法国经济将克服政治和预算方面的不确定性，在明年上半年继续保持增长。【原文：France’s economy is set to keep growing through the first half of next year, overcoming heightened political and budget uncertainty.】

item.title: 谷歌在各产品中发布更高效的双子座 3 人工智能模型
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）正在其所有产品中推出效率更高、价格更合理的最强大人工智能模型版本，这是该公司在成功推出双子座 3（Gemini 3）之后的新势头。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is rolling out a more efficient and affordable version of its most powerful artificial intelligence model across its products, building on the company’s momentum after the successful launch of Gemini 3.】

item.title: 重启外汇政策后，IMF 董事会将于周三讨论阿根廷问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织执行董事会将于周三在华盛顿举行的一次非正式会议上讨论阿根廷的 200 亿美元计划。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board will discuss Argentina’s $20 billion program on Wednesday during an informal session in Washington, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Aegea 准备 2026 年上市，与伊塔乌、BTG 和摩根士丹利合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西环卫公司 Aegea Saneamento e Participacoes SA 正在与 BTG Pactual SA、Itau BBA 和摩根士丹利合作，可能在 2026 年进行首次公开募股。【原文：Brazilian sanitation company Aegea Saneamento e Participacoes SA is working with BTG Pactual SA, Itau BBA and Morgan Stanley for a potential IPO in 2026, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大油砂抵御价格下跌，计划 2026 年实现增长
item.description: 以 Cenovus Energy Inc. 为首的加拿大油砂生产商计划明年扩大生产，尽管即将出现的供应过剩有可能加深原油价格的低迷。【原文：Canadian oil sands producers lead by Cenovus Energy Inc. plan to expand production next year despite an impending supply glut that threatens to deepen the slump in crude prices.】

item.title: 贝莱德将为员工的 "特朗普账户 "捐款提供配捐
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. will match government contributions to “Trump accounts” for its employees, making it one of the first major US companies to lay out plans for supporting the early-childhood savings program.】

item.title: Bending Spoons 为 AOL 收购融资交易提供优惠条件
item.description: 意大利科技初创企业 Bending Spoons 大幅改善了向投资者提供的高达 13.5 亿美元收购融资方案的条件。【原文：Italian tech startup Bending Spoons has significantly improved the terms it is offering to investors on an acquisition financing package of as much as $1.35 billion.】

item.title: Medline在本年度最大规模首次公开募股后表示将高开6.9
item.description: Medline 公司的股票开盘价比首次公开发行价高出 6.9%，这家医疗供应商在今年最大的一次上市中筹集了 62.6 亿美元。【原文：Medline Inc. shares are indicated to open 6.9% above their initial public offering price, after the medical supplier raised $6.26 billion in the year’s biggest listing.】

item.title: 汽车制造商和气候组织联合批评欧盟电动汽车计划
item.description: 欧盟建议通过放宽严格的排放规定来帮助欧洲濒临破产的汽车行业，目的是帮助陷入困境的汽车制造商。然而，汽车行业和气候运动人士都没有为此感到高兴。【原文：The European Union’s proposal to help Europe’s ailing auto industry by softening strict emissions rules was intended to help struggling carmakers. Yet neither the industry nor climate campaigners are celebrating.】

item.title: 伊根-琼斯举报人建立了自己的私人信用评级机构
item.description: Michael Brawer 在 Egan-Jones Ratings Co. 担任首席风险官长达四年多时间，见证了该公司成长为私人信贷市场的一支生力军。【原文：Michael Brawer spent more than four years as chief risk officer at Egan-Jones Ratings Co., seeing the firm grow into a force in the private credit market.】

item.title: 凯雷将发起要约收购日本公司 Hogy Medical
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. has launched a takeover offer for Hogy Medical Co. in the latest private equity-led deal of a Japanese company.】

item.title: 欧洲导弹制造商吹捧无人机战争的低成本解决方案
item.description: 欧洲防务初创企业弗兰肯堡科技公司（Frankenburg Technologies）称，其微型防空导弹已成功通过测试，可对付俄罗斯向乌克兰发射的高速攻击无人机。【原文：European defense startup Frankenburg Technologies says its tiny air-defense missiles have been successfully tested against high-speed attack drones like those Russia launches at Ukraine, as militaries hunt for cost-effective ways to counter cheap threats.】
